# Lincoln Park Roofing

> Lincoln Park Roofing is a licensed, insured roofing contractor with over 20 years of experience serving Lincoln Park, MI 48146 and the Downriver Michigan area. We specialize in residential and commercial roof replacement, roof repair, certified roof rejuvenation, siding, seamless gutters, and storm damage insurance claim assistance. Call (734) 224-5615 for a free estimate.

## Core Services

- **Roof Replacement:** Complete tear-off and new roof installation using architectural shingles, ice and water shield, proper ventilation, and clean workmanship. Serving Lincoln Park, Allen Park, Taylor, and all of Downriver.
- **Roof Repair:** Emergency and scheduled repair for leaks, missing shingles, wind damage, flashing failure, and ice dam issues. Same-day response available.
- **Roof Rejuvenation:** Certified asphalt shingle restoration treatment that extends roof life by 5-15 years. Lincoln Park Roofing is the only company offering roof rejuvenation in Wayne County and Oakland County.
- **New Roof Construction:** Roofing systems for new residential builds, home additions, and custom construction projects.
- **Siding:** Vinyl and fiber cement siding installation for improved curb appeal and energy efficiency.
- **Seamless Gutters:** Gutter replacement, seamless gutter installation, and gutter guards to protect foundations and fascia from water damage.
- **Insurance Claims:** Expert storm damage documentation, adjuster coordination, and full guidance through the roof insurance claim process.

## Service Area
- **Primary:** Lincoln Park, MI (48146)
- **Downriver:** Allen Park, Ecorse, Melvindale, River Rouge, Southgate, Wyandotte, Trenton, Grosse Ile, Taylor, Riverview
- **Western Wayne County:** Dearborn Heights, Wayne, Livonia, Plymouth
- **Additional:** Ypsilanti, Westland, Canton, Northville, Garden City

## Contact
- **Phone:** (734) 224-5615
- **Website:** https://lincolnparkroofing.com/
